Faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
Faq.subtitle: Find answers to commonly asked questions about our services

q1.question: What is Super App Naiera?
q1.answer: Super App Naiera is an integrated digital platform providing access to various Naiera Regency government services in one app.

q2.question: How do I register an account?
q2.answer: You can register by clicking the 'Register' button on the homepage, then filling out the registration form with valid personal information.

q3.question: Is this service free?
q3.answer: Yes, most basic services on Super App Naiera are free for Naiera Regency residents. Some specific services may require administrative fees.

q4.question: How do I report a technical issue?
q4.answer: You can report technical issues through the Complaint Service menu or contact our helpdesk at (021) 123-4567.

q5.question: How do I pay taxes through the app?
q5.answer: Select Services > Tax & Retribution, enter your tax object number, then follow the payment instructions using various available methods.
